summary: Music, art and chaos in the wild West-Berlin of the 1980s. The walled-in city became the creative melting pot for sub- and pop-culture. Before the iron curtain fell, everything and anything... See full summary »

title: B-Movie: Lust & Sound in West-Berlin 1979-1989
